page.title: 08Trade in East Huntspill
page.content:
The hardware shop is a family business.It has a range of 800 items including china, nuts and bolts, gardening equipment electrical fittings and a few sweets. The shop opens six days a week with early closing on Wednesdays. The shop is over 50 years old and has recently had roof repairs. Deliveries are made once a month and products come from Bristol, Taunton and Exeter.
The local grocers shop is a family trade. The shop is over 200 years old and has once had a cow wandering inside! the shop's stock is ordered weekly and comes from local cash and carry
